bestMatch.name: Poco F6
bestMatch.why: It features the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, which provides the highest raw performance and gaming benchmarks in this price bracket, paired with a solid Sony IMX882 main sensor for quality photography.
cons: Ultrawide camera is average compared to main sensor

alternatives.name: Realme GT 6T
alternatives.reason: Equipped with the Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 and a massive 5500mAh battery with 120W charging, offering superior battery life for long gaming sessions.

alternatives.name: Motorola Edge 50 Pro
alternatives.reason: Offers a more balanced camera system including a telephoto lens and a premium display, though the Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 is slightly less powerful for hardcore gaming.

summary: For a budget of 30,000, the Poco F6 is the performance leader for gaming. If you prefer better battery endurance and faster charging, the Realme GT 6T is the ideal runner-up, while the Motorola Edge 50 Pro is better if photography is as important as gaming.
